price: Indeed, We have made it an Arabic Qur’an so that you may understand,
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَٰنًا عَرَبِيّٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
